comment: Hes a great professor. No tests. Midterm and final are papers that are really easy.

Dr. J is an awesome Professor. Fair grader, responds quickly to emails and very transparent (everything on the syllabus is what is covered exactly in class). Discussion posts every week, midterm, final, 2 article reviews and an organizational assessment paper. Keep up every week and you will do just fine. No reason why you cant earn an A here!
I got a 100 in this class. Need I say more? As long as you do the work, you will pass. There are assignments were you need to cite material from the book, but I never actually read the book.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: There were a handful of papers that were required for this class, but they weren't too challenging. Book needed in order to do well on papers. Great professor because he is an easy grader and gives awesome/helpful feedback. I would absolutely take Professor Misner again.

Professor Misner is awesome. He is quick to respond to emails and really knows what hes doing. He also understands that not one size fits all when it comes to tests so he helps with study guides and lets other work like discussion boards and papers reflect in your grade.

Dr. Misner cares about your academic and career success. He wants you to do well and it shows. For writing assignments, he clearly explains the expectations. You just have to do the work. No excuse not to do well in this course. Expect a good deal of reading and writing. Very straightforward. I took Leading in Groups online.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Misner is as humble as they come. He is a true Servant Leader, serving his students. He is truly dedicated to helping you learn. If you want to truly grow as a human, this is the Professor. Feedback was amazing. Grades are fair for the effort. You will learn more from him, than the textbook! I highly recommend Dr. Misner! Great guy! A++++++++++
